com.quest.glue.api.services
Interface AgentResourceRestartVeto

public interface AgentResourceRestartVeto

AgentResourceRestartVeto Instance passed in as a parameter to the AgentResourceRestartNotificationListener invocations that will allow the registered listener to veto/delay the restart request

Since:
5.6.10

Method Summary
 void delayRestartRequest(boolean delayRestart)
          Invoke to notify the resource manager if the pending restart should be delayed
 

Method Detail

delayRestartRequest

void delayRestartRequest(boolean delayRestart)
Invoke to notify the resource manager if the pending restart should be delayed

Parameters:
delayRestart - true to delay restart
